readable.content: A person is on a ramp on a skateboard . A person on skies is up in the air over snow . A person performs a snowboarding trick on a rail as a man crouches down to get a better view . person on snowboard in the air doing a jump Someone in white is performing a skateboard trick at night while a kneeling person watches .
